content: Hi, everyone. If you are signed up and/or interested in working on LIVD (LOINC to In Vitro Diagnostic) this weekend please make sure that you are registered and indicate that in the ConMan tool. It would be good to indicate that by posting here, too, as we may be somewhat distributed (and many of us are wearing multiple hats) and communicating here will help us keep track and follow our progress.
Just a reminder to everyone on this track to send me a brief note of what you have done and are doing for the track report. Thanks!
Make sure you go to the track stream through WHOVA app :)
